name: otrust-workspace
description: Workspace for Onomy Bonding Curve Development

scripts.ui:verify: yarn build-modules && yarn workspace otrust verify-old
scripts.lint: concurrently "yarn client:lint" "yarn react-client:lint" "yarn react-eth:lint" "yarn react-utils:lint" "yarn react-wallet:lint" "yarn ui:lint"
scripts.tsc: concurrently "yarn client:tsc" "yarn react-client:tsc" "yarn react-eth:tsc" "yarn react-utils:tsc" "yarn react-wallet:tsc" "yarn ui:tsc"
scripts.verify: concurrently "yarn client:tsc" "yarn react-client:verify" "yarn react-eth:verify" "yarn react-utils:verify" "yarn react-wallet:verify" "yarn ui:verify"
scripts.start: yarn dev && yarn workspace otrust start
scripts.build-modules: yarn react-utils:build && concurrently "yarn client:build" "yarn react-client:build" "yarn react-eth:build" "yarn react-wallet:build" "yarn wallet:build" "yarn wallet-web:build"
scripts.dev: concurrently "yarn client:dev" "yarn react-client:dev" "yarn react-eth:dev" "yarn react-wallet:dev" "yarn react-utils:dev" "yarn wallet:dev" "yarn wallet-web:dev"
scripts.build: yarn build-modules && yarn workspace otrust build
scripts.verified-build: yarn build-modules && yarn workspace otrust verified-build
scripts.test: yarn build-modules && yarn workspace otrust test
